name: deeper get deeper || Ludumdare 48 || Fischer Maximilian
name_original: deeper get deeper || Ludumdare 48 || Fischer Maximilian
description:
Hi, this is my Game

Controls WASD and Mouse Space Jump(press it longer for an longer jump) shift for sprinting

Your Goal is to travel as far as you can.

The Levels are generated not hand made

When you finished one level you have to walk near this read object

Thanks for Playing :)

PS there are two tipes of levels
